meanings.definition: Not appropriate or fitting in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The clown's unseemliest outfit made the children laugh.
meanings.sent2: It is unseemliest to wear pajamas to a formal event.
meanings.sent3: She showed up in an unseemliest costume to the job interview.
meanings.sent4: His unseemliest behavior at the party shocked everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unseemliest hat at the party was a traffic cone.

meanings.definition: Lacking in propriety or good taste.
meanings.sent1: Her unseemliest jokes made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: It is unseemliest to talk loudly in a library.
meanings.sent3: He wore the unseemliest socks with sandals to the beach.
meanings.sent4: The unseemliest painting in the gallery was a stick figure.
meanings.sent5: The unseemliest dish at the potluck was burnt to a crisp.

meanings.sent1: The unseemliest time to call is during the night.
meanings.sent2: It would be unseemliest to wear a swimsuit to a funeral.
meanings.sent3: He chose the unseemliest moment to tell a joke during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The unseemliest place to nap is in the middle of the road.
meanings.sent5: The unseemliest gift for a wedding was a rubber chicken.
